languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс впивается в Идиру взглядом.{/n} "Псайкер. Любопытно. Предсказатель. Еще любопытнее. Вы были санкционированы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс впивается в Идиру взглядом.{/n} "Псайкер. Любопытно. Предсказатель. Еще любопытнее. И часто у вас случаются подобные... эпизоды?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс впивается в Идиру взглядом.{/n} "Псайкер. Любопытно. Предсказатель. Еще любопытнее. Вы были санкционированы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Curious. A scryer. More curious still. Do you get these... episodes often?"
{n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Curious. A scryer. More curious still. Do you get these... episodes often?"
{n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Do you get these... episodes often?"
{n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Do you get these... episodes often?"
{n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

languages.text: {n}海因里希以锐利的目光盯着伊迪拉。{/n}“是位灵能者，真有趣。还是位占卜师，这就更有趣了。你得到授权了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希以锐利的目光盯着伊迪拉。{/n}“是位灵能者，真有趣。还是位占卜师，这就更有趣了。你得到授权了吗？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix examina a Idira con atención.{/n} «Una psíquica. Interesante. Y adivina, además. Aún más interesante. ¿Está autorizada?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix examina a Idira con atención.{/n} «Una psíquica. Interesante. Y adivina, además. Aún más interesante. ¿Está autorizada?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはイディラを鋭く凝視する。{/n}「異能者か。おもしろい。しかも予言能力か。実におもしろいぞ。認可はあるのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはイディラを鋭く凝視する。{/n}「異能者か。おもしろい。しかも予言能力か。実におもしろいぞ。認可はあるのか？」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix observe attentivement Idira.{/n} « Une psyker. Intéressant. Et devineresse, avec ça. Encore mieux. Vous êtes assermentée ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observe attentivement Idira.{/n} « Une psyker. Intéressant. Et devineresse, avec ça. Encore mieux. Vous êtes assermentée ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mustert Idira aufmerksam.{/n} "Eine Psionikerin. Interessant. Und eine Seherin dazu. Noch interessanter. Seid Ihr sanktioniert?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mustert Idira aufmerksam.{/n} "Eine Psionikerin. Interessant. Und eine Seherin dazu. Noch interessanter. Seid Ihr sanktioniert?"

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, İdira'ya pürdikkat süzüyor.{/n} "Bir ruhsezer. İlginç. Üstelik de kâhin. Daha da ilginç. Onaylı mıydın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix eyes Idira keenly.{/n} "A psyker. Interesting. And a diviner, at that. Even more interesting. Are you sanctioned?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, İdira'ya pürdikkat süzüyor.{/n} "Bir ruhsezer. İlginç. Üstelik de kâhin. Daha da ilginç. Onaylı mıydın?"
